items.name: Goku
items.description: The protagonist, known for his great power and friendly nature, sent to Earth to survive Freeza's destruction of his planet. Goku is dedicated to defending Earth, continually seeking to surpass his limits and protect his friends and family. His cheerful and optimistic personality makes him a beloved hero.

items.name: Vegeta
items.description: Prince of the Saiyans, initially a villain, becomes Goku's rival and later an ally defending Earth. Vegeta is fiercely proud of his Saiyan heritage and constantly pushes himself to compete with Goku. His journey from villain to hero is one of redemption, and he becomes a devoted family man.

items.name: Piccolo
items.description: Originally Goku's enemy, Piccolo evolves into a hero and a loyal mentor to Gohan. His wisdom, strength, and strategic mind make him one of the most important members of the Z Fighters. Piccolo's bond with Gohan is especially strong, and he often acts as a surrogate father to him.

items.name: Bulma
items.description: A brilliant inventor, Goku’s close friend and Vegeta’s wife. She is instrumental in the search for Dragon Balls and creates many of the technological devices used by the Z Fighters. Her intelligence and resourcefulness often save the day, and her bold personality makes her a key character.

items.name: Freezer
items.description: A galactic tyrant and the main antagonist of the Frieza saga. Freeza is cruel, ruthless, and incredibly powerful, ruling over vast territories of the universe. His ambition for power and control drives much of the conflict in the Dragon Ball series, and he remains one of Goku's greatest foes.

items.name: Zarbon
items.description: A loyal and powerful warrior serving under Freeza. Zarbon is known for his beauty and his brutal strength in combat. He has a transformation that significantly increases his power, making him one of Freeza’s most trusted and formidable fighters.

items.name: Dodoria
items.description: A brutal enforcer under Freeza's command. Dodoria is known for his savage nature and cruelty in battle, showing little mercy to his enemies. Despite his brute strength, Dodoria is often outclassed by the more skilled warriors in Freeza’s army.

items.name: Ginyu
items.description: Leader of Freeza's elite mercenaries, known for his ability to switch bodies. Captain Ginyu is a proud and skilled warrior who leads the Ginyu Force with precision. His body-switching technique makes him a unique and dangerous opponent in battle.

items.name: Celula
items.description: A bio-android created by Dr. Gero’s computer, seeking to absorb others to achieve perfection. Celula’s quest for perfection drives him to absorb powerful fighters, and his ability to regenerate makes him nearly indestructible. His intelligence and strategic mind make him one of the most dangerous villains the Z Fighters have ever faced.

items.name: Gohan
items.description: Goku's eldest son, a hybrid Saiyan, and human. He becomes a key defender of Earth, though his gentle nature often makes him reluctant to fight. However, when pushed to his limits, Gohan has demonstrated some of the most incredible power displays in the series, making him a vital warrior.

items.name: Krillin
items.description: Goku’s best friend and a skilled martial artist, known for his bravery. Despite being a human among powerful Saiyans and alien warriors, Krillin has proven himself countless times in battle. His determination and courage make him one of the most trusted and reliable members of the Z Fighters.

items.name: Tenshinhan
items.description: A disciplined martial artist and powerful ally to Goku and the Z Fighters. Tenshinhan's stoic and serious demeanor reflects his commitment to constant self-improvement and protecting Earth. His signature techniques, such as the Tri-Beam, demonstrate his powerful and unique abilities.

items.name: Yamcha
items.description: Former desert bandit who becomes a martial artist and Z Fighter. While often outmatched by stronger opponents, Yamcha's loyalty to his friends and his fighting spirit are unshakable. He has a cheerful, carefree personality and remains a valued member of the Z Fighters.

items.name: Chi-Chi
items.description: Goku's wife and mother of Gohan and Goten, known for her strict parenting. While she may not be a fighter, Chi-Chi is a strong-willed and caring mother who fiercely protects her family. Her concerns for Gohan's education and future often put her at odds with Goku's carefree attitude.

items.name: Gotenks
items.description: Fusion of Goten and Trunks, known for his immense power and playful personality. Gotenks is both a formidable fighter and a mischievous prankster, often taking battles less seriously than he should. His fusion abilities make him one of the strongest characters in his age group.

items.name: Trunks
items.description: Son of Vegeta and Bulma, a skilled warrior and Goten’s best friend. Trunks is brave and intelligent, inheriting both his father's fighting skills and his mother's sharp mind. In battle, he shows determination beyond his years, always eager to live up to his parents' legacies.

items.name: Master Roshi
items.description: A legendary martial arts master and mentor to Goku and the Z Fighters. Known for his eccentric personality, Master Roshi has trained some of Earth's most powerful warriors. Despite his advanced age, he continues to surprise everyone with his combat abilities and wisdom.

items.name: Bardock
items.description: Goku's father, a low-class Saiyan warrior who fought to protect his race. Bardock's defiance against the tyrant Freeza marked him as one of the first to challenge his empire. His heroic struggle left a lasting legacy, as his son Goku would later become Freeza's greatest adversary.

items.name: Raditz
items.description: Goku’s brother, who initially comes to Earth to recruit him for the Saiyan army. Raditz's arrival marked the beginning of a series of conflicts that would change Goku's life forever. Though not as strong as his fellow Saiyans, Raditz played a pivotal role in revealing Goku’s Saiyan heritage.

items.name: Nappa
items.description: A high-ranking Saiyan warrior who accompanies Vegeta to Earth. Nappa's brutal combat style and towering physique make him a fearsome adversary. Though ultimately defeated, his arrival alongside Vegeta signals the increasing threat from the Saiyan race.

items.name: Broly
items.description: A legendary Super Saiyan with immense power, featured as a major antagonist in several movies. Broly’s raw strength is unparalleled, and his uncontrollable rage makes him a nearly unstoppable force. His tragic backstory and rivalry with Goku and Vegeta have made him a fan-favorite character.

items.name: Majin Buu
items.description: An ancient creature of immense power, capable of endless regeneration and destruction. Majin Buu's playful and childish nature hides the devastating destruction he is capable of. His ability to transform into various forms, each more dangerous than the last, makes him a formidable opponent for the Z Fighters.

items.name: Beerus
items.description: The God of Destruction from Universe 7, responsible for maintaining balance by destroying planets. Beerus is both feared and respected throughout the multiverse due to his immense power. Despite his lazy and food-loving personality, when Beerus is serious, his strength can obliterate entire galaxies.

items.name: Whis
items.description: An angel and Beerus’ attendant, one of the most powerful beings in Universe 7. Whis is responsible for training Beerus and keeping him in check, though he often shows a carefree and playful side. His abilities far surpass those of most gods, making him one of the most mysterious and powerful figures in the multiverse.

items.name: Jiren
items.description: A member of the Pride Troopers and one of the strongest mortals in the multiverse. Jiren’s overwhelming power and stoic personality make him a feared and respected warrior. His past, driven by loss and tragedy, fuels his relentless pursuit of strength, and he is considered an unstoppable force, even rivaling gods.

items.name: Zeno
items.description: The Omni-King, the supreme ruler of all the multiverses with the ability to erase entire universes. Despite his childlike appearance and playful nature, Zeno holds the ultimate power over all realities. His decisions are absolute, and even gods tremble before him, knowing he can erase anything on a whim.
